name: Sea of Tranquility EP
description:
DÃ©but EP from Cut Out Shapes on Leeds based label D.I. Records.

Limited Edition replicated CD in a 320gsm glossy thick card sleeve with full colour artwork on both sides and disc. 

Includes new recordings:

Sea of Tranquility

Desert Song 

Past Lives

Engineered by Will Jackson (Pigeon Detectives, The Music, Cribs) at Soundworks Studio Leeds. Produced and mixed by the band.

Mastered at Metropolis mastering studios in London by Andrew Baldwin. (Placebo, Interpol)

Once sold out this will not be re-pressed or the tracks available anywhere else.


Orders will be dispatched same or next day as received in hard cardboard sleeves. 

For European and rest of world orders please select your country and complete checkout as normal. There are postage discounts for more than one CD to the same address.

All items are insured for loss or damage, any problems in transit let us know on direcordz@gmail.com
